items.summary: Implement sitewide smooth scrolling for normal page scrolling (mousewheel/trackpad) using a global CSS approach, with strict prefers-reduced-motion compliance so reduced-motion users get default (non-smooth) scrolling.

Make scroll-to-top and section-jump transitions feel smoother across the entire site by tuning the scroll-to-top easing/duration (frontend/src/hooks/useScrollBehavior.ts) and standardizing section-jump behavior so it is consistent with prefers-reduced-motion support.

Apply a light-touch homepage polish pass (frontend/src/pages/ForgeHomePage.tsx + existing global Tailwind utilities) focused on micro-motion, spacing, and small visual refinements (glow softness, gradient subtlety, hierarchy tightening) without changing the homepage information architecture or adding new sections/features.
